pronounify.config.title: Pronounify
pronounify.config.showInChat.name: Show In Chat
pronounify.config.showInChat.description: Adds the pronouns to players' chat messages.
pronounify.config.showOnNametag.name: Show On Nametag
pronounify.config.showOnNametag.descript: Adds the pronouns to players' nametags above their heads.
pronounify.config.showInTooltip.name: Show In Tooltip
pronounify.config.showInTooltip.descript: Adds the pronouns to the player's name when hovering over their name in the chat message with advanced tooltips enabled.
pronounify.config.showInSocialScreen.des: Adds the pronouns next to the player's name in the social interaction screen.
